collection.name: Musnad Ahmad
collection.description: Musnad Ahmad is one of the most comprehensive and important collections of hadith, compiled by Imam Ahmad ibn Hanbal (rahimahullah). It is the largest collection of hadith divided by the names of individual companions, with approximately 28,199 narrations. This collection is highly respected in Islamic tradition and is a key source of the Sunnah of the Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ).
